item.title: Colin Hanks Says TIFF Was the Only Launchpad for ‘John Candy: I Like Me’: “The Man’s Nickname was Johnny Toronto”
item.description: The feature documentary about the comedy legend from director Hanks and producer Ryan Reynolds will have a world premiere on Thursday night to open the Toronto Film Festival.

item.title: ‘John Candy: I Like Me’ Trailer Reveals Gentle, Vulnerable Comedy Genius
item.description: Director Colin Hanks and producer Ryan Reynolds’ feature documentary will world premiere at the Toronto Film Festival on Thursday night, ahead of an Oct. 10 Prime Video debut.

item.title: Nashville Film Festival Books ‘Kiss of the Spider Woman,’ Colin Hanks’ Doc ‘John Candy: I Like Me’
item.description: The 56th annual fest is scheduled to take place Sept. 18-24.
